text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActRelationshipCheckpoint where concept is-a X

name: ActRelationshipCheckpointExit
title: ActRelationshipCheckpointExit
description: Condition is a loop checkpoint, i.e. it is a step of an activity plan and, if negative causes the containing loop to exit.
